service_definition_overrides.ItemInfo/AccessInformation: RGB Decomposition products processed by ASF DAAC HyP3 using GAMMA software. Contains modified Copernicus Sentinel data, processed by ESA.
service_definition_overrides.ItemInfo/Description: Sentinel-1 RGB Decomposition of RTC VV and VH imagery, processed by ASF. Blue areas have low returns in VV and VH (smooth surfaces such as calm water, but also frozen/crusted soil or dry sand), green areas have high returns in VH (volume scatterers such as vegetation or some types of snow/ice), and red areas have relatively high VV returns and relatively low VH returns (such as urban or sparsely vegetated areas).
service_definition_overrides.ItemInfo/Snippet: Sentinel-1 RGB Decomposition of RTC VV and VH imagery, processed by ASF. Blue areas have low returns in VV and VH (smooth surfaces such as calm water, but also frozen/crusted soil or dry sand), green areas have high returns in VH (volume scatterers such as vegetation or some types of snow/ice), and red areas have relatively high VV returns and relatively low VH returns (such as urban or sparsely vegetated areas).
